text: hey everyone eric here starting up a really fun segment i think i'm calling it small stacks and essentially what i'm going to do is take a segment of my portfolio and trade it as if i would a smaller account so i decided to take 5k and the reason why i picked that number is i think that that's like pretty much the absolute minimum you should consider trading options with so with that part in mind i want to jump over to the main screen and kind of talk through what this is going to look like so it will be a margin account although i do not expect to use margin frequently the goal is not what most people typically attribute i stand firmly in my belief that small accounts essentially you know below 20 25k their primary goal shouldn't necessarily be to turn into a bunch of money and the reason why i say that is because small accounts have a lot of shortcomings that they have to work around i.e the ability to manage risk is a big one so the goals i have for this account is exactly what i would for any small account which is make sure that we're preserving capital and we're learning obviously i don't really need to do either of these so in my for my personal goal i'm gonna try to pace the market in in the account and the reason why that goes a little bit different

text: to highlight risk management is going to be tough that's the case for any sort of small account i accept the fact that i very frequently will be over allocated it's again just how small accounts go now i want to put this disclaimer out because i really think to many people's dismay they're going to expect me to be wheeling and dealing and trading a bunch and it's i'm not it's probably going to be pretty boring for most people because i think that that's the right way to approach a small account is to not actively trade it trying to capture intraday moves and stuff like that i think if you're lucky you'll break even doing that if more probably more probable than not you'll lose money so again my approach is going to be to model this account just like i would again if like five thousand dollars is all i had and i wanted to grow it so in in that vein it's gonna be a lot of buy and hold so it's gonna be what it's gonna be i i wanna share that up front because i know that a lot of folks want to actively trade and stuff like that if you have a small account i don't think it's a good idea so i'm not going to do it i'm not going to set some sort of poor example i'm going to try to do what i say i think is best and
